import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import HistoryAPI from "../API/HistoryAPI"; function History(props) { const [history, setHistory] = useState([]); const [load, setLoad] = useState(false); const [text, setText] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { const response = await HistoryAPI.getAll(); setHistory(response.data); }; fetchData(); }, []); return (

{value.user._id} {value.user.fullName} {value.phone} {value.address} {value.total} {value.delivery ? "Đã Vận Chuyển" : "Chưa Vận Chuyển"} {value.status ? "Đã Thanh Toán" : "Chưa Thanh Toán"} View
); } export default History;
